message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you 40, and I'll get 60. You can't do better than this, right?
I think we can do better than a 60-40 split. Let's meet in the middle.
You wanted to meet in the middle, but I'll give you a bit less. I'll take 55, and you can have 45. It's still a good deal!
I'm not convinced that 55 is the best deal for me. I'll try to get a better split.
I'll compromise a bit more. I'll take 52, and you can have 48. It's a fair deal, don't you think?
I'm not willing to give up more than 45. I think I can do better than this.
